title: Neural Module Network workload in pyTorch
body_html:
@soumith Good to know that pyTorch supports dynamic graph. Our team is working on a workload called NMN which is implemented in ApolloCaffe. As far as i know, the NMN model need to build a new model in every iteration according to the input questions , and we think that this workload is very suitable for pyTorch to demonstrate the flexibility of the dynamic graph.

Do you guys have any schedule to implement this NMN workload in pyTorch?
Do you think there is any dependency to be resolved in pyTorch if we want to do it?
Any suggestion would be great for us.
Thanks

body:
@soumith Good to know that  pyTorch supports dynamic graph. Our team is working on a workload called [NMN](https://github.com/jacobandreas/nmn2) which is implemented in [ApolloCaffe](https://github.com/jacobandreas/apollocaffe). As far as i know, the NMN model need to build a new model in every iteration according to the input questions , and we think that this workload is very suitable for pyTorch to demonstrate the flexibility of the dynamic graph.

Do you guys have any schedule to implement this NMN workload in pyTorch?
Do you think there is any dependency to be resolved in pyTorch if we want to do it?
Any suggestion would be great for us.
Thanks
